Song Management - Vocal Pitch Monitor

1. Search Song by ID

Endpoint: GET /song/{songId}
Example: http://localhost:8080/song/1

2. Upload Files

Vocal Track Endpoint: POST /vocal/{songId}
Audio Track Endpoint: POST /audio/{songId}
Note: Song must exist before uploading files
Upload vocal track file (MP3, WAV, etc.)
Upload audio track file (MP3, WAV, etc.)

3. Search /Save Artist by Name

Search Artist Endpoint: GET /artist/{artist_name}
Save Artist Endpoint: POST /artist/save
Examples:
- Search: http://localhost:8080/artist/John%20Doe
- Save: http://localhost:8080/artist/save?name=John%20Doe

4. Get All Songs

Endpoint: GET /song/all
Example: http://localhost:8080/song/all

5. Save New Song

Endpoint: POST /song/save
Note: Create a new song entry

Note: This would require a JSON request body. See backend SongDto structure.

{ "title": "Song Title", "artist": { "id": 1, "name": "Artist Name" }, "genre": "Pop", "releaseYear": 2023 }

6. Audio Streaming Player

Play Endpoint: GET /play/{track_id}
Info Endpoint: GET /play/info
Example: http://localhost:8080/play/1
